entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
